mapper.select: SELECT GUID, CLASSNAME, SUPERCLASSGUID, DESCRIPTION, ISBUILTIN, CREATETIME, CREATEUSERGUID, UPDATETIME, UPDATEUSERGUID, BASETABLENAME, LIFECYCLE, INTERFACES, NONQUERYABLE, SUPERINTERFACE, ITERATIONLIMIT, INSTANCESTRING, CLASSIFICATION, ABSTRACT, FINAL, ICONPATH, SHOWPREVIEW, ICONPATH32, ISCREATETABLE, REALBASETABLENAME, ISIDUNIQUE, (SELECT A.CLASSNAME FROM MA_CLASS A WHERE A.GUID=M.SUPERCLASSGUID) SUPERCLASS, (SELECT A.CODENAME FROM MA_CODE_MASTER A WHERE A.GUID = M.CLASSIFICATION AND A.ISCLASSIFICATION = 'Y') CLASSIFICATIONNAME, (SELECT A.LCMNAME FROM MA_LIFECYCLE_MASTER A WHERE A.GUID = M.LIFECYCLE) LIFECYCLENAME FROM MA_CLASS M

SELECT GUID, CLASSNAME, SUPERCLASSGUID, DESCRIPTION, ISBUILTIN, CREATETIME, CREATEUSERGUID, UPDATETIME, UPDATEUSERGUID, BASETABLENAME, LIFECYCLE, INTERFACES, NONQUERYABLE, SUPERINTERFACE, ITERATIONLIMIT, INSTANCESTRING, CLASSIFICATION, ABSTRACT, FINAL, ICONPATH, SHOWPREVIEW, ICONPATH32, ISCREATETABLE, REALBASETABLENAME, ISIDUNIQUE, (SELECT A.CLASSNAME FROM MA_CLASS A WHERE A.GUID=M.SUPERCLASSGUID) SUPERCLASS, (SELECT A.CODENAME FROM MA_CODE_MASTER A WHERE A.GUID = M.CLASSIFICATION AND A.ISCLASSIFICATION = 'Y') CLASSIFICATIONNAME, (SELECT A.LCMNAME FROM MA_LIFECYCLE_MASTER A WHERE A.GUID = M.LIFECYCLE) LIFECYCLENAME FROM MA_CLASS M WHERE GUID=#GUID#

SELECT GUID, CLASSNAME, SUPERCLASSGUID, DESCRIPTION, ISBUILTIN, CREATETIME, CREATEUSERGUID, UPDATETIME, UPDATEUSERGUID, BASETABLENAME, LIFECYCLE, INTERFACES, NONQUERYABLE, SUPERINTERFACE, ITERATIONLIMIT, INSTANCESTRING, CLASSIFICATION, ABSTRACT, FINAL, ICONPATH, SHOWPREVIEW, ICONPATH32, ISCREATETABLE, REALBASETABLENAME, ISIDUNIQUE, (SELECT A.CLASSNAME FROM MA_CLASS A WHERE A.GUID=M.SUPERCLASSGUID) SUPERCLASS, (SELECT A.CODENAME FROM MA_CODE_MASTER A WHERE A.GUID = M.CLASSIFICATION AND A.ISCLASSIFICATION = 'Y') CLASSIFICATIONNAME, (SELECT A.LCMNAME FROM MA_LIFECYCLE_MASTER A WHERE A.GUID = M.LIFECYCLE) LIFECYCLENAME FROM MA_CLASS M WHERE 1=1
AND GUID = #GUID#
AND CLASSNAME = #CLASSNAME#
AND SUPERCLASSGUID = #SUPERCLASSGUID#
SELECT GUID, CLASSNAME, BASETABLENAME FROM MA_CLASS M WHERE M.ISCREATETABLE = 'Y' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM MA_CLASS M2 WHERE M.SUPERCLASSGUID = M2.GUID AND M2.ISCREATETABLE = 'N' )
SELECT DISTINCT M.REALBASETABLENAME FROM MA_CLASS M WHERE M.REALBASETABLENAME IS NOT NULL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MA_CLASS(GUID, CLASSNAME, SUPERCLASSGUID, DESCRIPTION, ISBUILTIN, BASETABLENAME, LIFECYCLE, INTERFACES, NONQUERYABLE, SUPERINTERFACE, ITERATIONLIMIT, INSTANCESTRING, CLASSIFICATION, ABSTRACT, FINAL, ICONPATH, SHOWPREVIEW, ICONPATH32, ISCREATETABLE, REALBASETABLENAME, ISIDUNIQUE, CREATETIME, CREATEUSERGUID, UPDATETIME, UPDATEUSERGUID ) VALUES(#GUID:VARCHAR#, #CLASSNAME:VARCHAR#, #SUPERCLASSGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #DESCRIPTION:VARCHAR:NULL#, #ISBUILTIN:VARCHAR:NULL#, #BASETABLENAME:VARCHAR:NULL#, #LIFECYCLE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #INTERFACES:VARCHAR:NULL#, #NONQUERYABLE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #SUPERINTERFACE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #ITERATIONLIMIT:VARCHAR:NULL#, #INSTANCESTRING:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CLASSIFICATION:VARCHAR:NULL#, #ABSTRACT:VARCHAR:NULL#, #FINAL:VARCHAR:NULL#, #ICONPATH:VARCHAR:NULL#, #SHOWPREVIEW:VARCHAR:NULL#, #ICONPATH32:VARCHAR:NULL#, #ISCREATETABLE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #REALBASETABLENAME:VARCHAR:NULL#, #ISIDUNIQUE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #CREATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #UPDATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL# )
mapper.update:
UPDATE MA_CLASS
UPDATEUSERGUID = #UPDATEUSERGUID#, UPDATETIME = #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, DESCRIPTION=#DESCRIPTION#, ISBUILTIN=#ISBUILTIN#, BASETABLENAME=#BASETABLENAME#, LIFECYCLE=#LIFECYCLE#, INTERFACES=#INTERFACES#, NONQUERYABLE=#NONQUERYABLE#, SUPERINTERFACE=#SUPERINTERFACE#, ITERATIONLIMIT=#ITERATIONLIMIT#, INSTANCESTRING=#INSTANCESTRING#, CLASSIFICATION=#CLASSIFICATION#, ABSTRACT=#ABSTRACT#, FINAL=#FINAL#, ICONPATH=#ICONPATH#, SHOWPREVIEW=#SHOWPREVIEW#, ICONPATH32=#ICONPATH32#, ISCREATETABLE=#ISCREATETABLE#, REALBASETABLENAME=#REALBASETABLENAME#, ISIDUNIQUE=#ISIDUNIQUE#,
WHERE GUID = #GUID#
UPDATE MA_CLASS SET UPDATEUSERGUID = #UPDATEUSERGUID#, UPDATETIME = #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP# ICONPATH=#ICONPATH# ICONPATH32=#ICONPATH32# WHERE GUID = #GUID#
